Issue.creator: jyellick
Issue.summary: Hook chaincode endorsement paths into the new peer resource config structure
Issue.description: The chaincode endorsement paths should retrieve a current copy of the peer resource configuration, and use it to determine whether a chaincode exists. In an ideal world, this operation would also affect the MVCC data by including the chaincode attributes in the MVCC set. Alternatively, a single MVCC read against the global peer resource configuration sequence could be used.
